{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amazon |model=Dash Wand |revision=1 Gen (OR83YV) |upc=848719037395 |asin=B01LBT75HE,B00GMSIHOU |fcc_date=03/20/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=IoT |fcc_id=2ABD7-5363 |pwr_v=3 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=battery powered |cpu1_brand=STMicroelectronics |cpu1_model=STM32F205 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q32BV |ram1= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43362 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |addl_chips=Barcode Decode Chip;ST;STM32F103;;1; |flags=Bluetooth, |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} {{TagLine|Amazon Dash Wand}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.amzn.com/B00GMSIHOU}}
This is the first generation of the '''Amazon Dash Wand'''. :Chip IDs are hidden in FCC photos.
*[https://mpetroff.net/2016/09/amazon-dash-wand-teardown/ ''Amazon Dash (Wand) Teardown'' from '''Matthew Petroff''']
